titles.title: A resolution honoring the life, legacy, and achievements of Marca Bristo.
A resolution honoring the life, legacy, and achievements of Marca Bristo.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: This resolution honors the life, legacy, and achievements of Marca Bristo as one of the leading advocates for people with disabilities.
